entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind east 20 km/h. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 4 May 2023
